definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: The Ice Storm and Ride with the Devil saw fairly mild box office success.
sentences.chinese: 但《冰風暴》和《與魔鬼共騎》的票房並不理想。

sentences.english: The state was deluged in winter ice storms when I took office.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛就職，全州就遭到了冬季的冰風暴肆虐。
